auth-fail-vlan.help: Enable to allow limited access to clients that cannot authenticate.
auth-fail-vlan.name: auth-fail-vlan

options.help: Disable authentication fail VLAN on this interface.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable authentication fail VLAN on this interface.
options.name: enable

auth-fail-vlan-id.help: VLAN ID on which authentication failed.
auth-fail-vlan-id.name: auth-fail-vlan-id

eap-passthru.help: Enable/disable EAP pass-through mode, allowing protocols (such as LLDP) to pass through ports for more flexible authentication.
eap-passthru.name: eap-passthru

options.help: Disable EAP pass-through mode on this interface.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable EAP pass-through mode on this interface.
options.name: enable

framevid-apply.help: Enable/disable the capability to apply the EAP/MAB frame VLAN to the port native VLAN.
framevid-apply.name: framevid-apply

options.help: Disable the capability to apply the EAP/MAB frame VLAN to the port native VLAN.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable the capability to apply the EAP/MAB frame VLAN to the port native VLAN.
options.name: enable

guest-vlan.help: Enable the guest VLAN feature to allow limited access to non-802.1X-compliant clients.
guest-vlan.name: guest-vlan

options.help: Disable guest VLAN on this interface.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable guest VLAN on this interface.
options.name: enable

open-auth.help: Enable/disable open authentication for this policy.
open-auth.name: open-auth

radius-timeout-overwrite.help: Enable to override the global RADIUS session timeout.
radius-timeout-overwrite.name: radius-timeout-overwrite

options.help: Override the global RADIUS session timeout.
options.name: disable

options.help: Use the global RADIUS session timeout.
options.name: enable

security-mode.help: Port or MAC based 802.1X security mode.
security-mode.name: security-mode

user-group.help: Name of user-group to assign to this MAC Authentication Bypass (MAB) policy.
user-group.name: user-group
